data.title: Tabitha King
data.meta_description: Tabitha King. Actress: Ritter auf heißen Öfen. Tabitha King was born on 24 March 1949 in Old Town, Maine, USA. She is an actress and writer, known for Ritter auf heißen Öfen (1981), The Sudbury Devil (2023) and Stephen King's Kingdom Hospital (2004). She has been married to Stephen King since 2 January 1971. They have three children.
data.text: Tabitha King was born on March 24, 1949 in Old Town, Maine, USA. She is an actress and writer, known for Ritter auf heißen Öfen (1981), The Sudbury Devil (2023) and Stephen King's Kingdom Hospital (2004). She has been married to Stephen King since January 2, 1971. They have three children.
